19681.<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「お:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Oi, Medde, do you remember where that old
village census thing is?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19682.<start_lip_sync n00409 _normal m00001>「あ:
<start_lip_sync n00409 _normal m00001>Ah? Didn't we throw the ones that were
over 50 years old out a long time ago?<stop_lip_animation n00409 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19683.<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>That's right! I forgot that I sent that
Hyuza guy to throw them out.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19684.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>Hmmm... The clue to this case was buried in
secret by the Chief. And yet, the Chief
doesn't seem like a criminal...<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19685.<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「お: <start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Oh, Rubecca. Playing detective, are you?<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19686.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>Dad... Chief Setorii, will you tell me where
you dumped that village census?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19687.<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>「う:
<start_lip_sync n00406 _normal m00001>Hmmm. If I recall, Hyuza told me he threw
it out on his way to the Forgotten Cave
in Leenam Fields.<stop_lip_animation n00406 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19688.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>...Hmmm, I see. So that's how it is.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19689.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「こ: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>I'll take this as the truth!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19690.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>My guess is that Hyuza, who is surprisingly
sincere, definitely dumped the village
census in the cave as he was told to do!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19691.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>Did you hear that, <pc>? The lead in
the Dahlia case lies in the cave, waiting
to be discovered!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19692.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>From here on, it's up to you. I'm the
brains, and you're the brawn. It's the
most efficient method.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19693.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>I'll wait here. You go check out the inside
of Forgotten Cave in Leenam Fields.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19694.魔物が 地面から 何かを掘りだしたようだ。:
It looks like a monster has dug something
out of the ground.

19697.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>Let's see... Hmm. I see, I see...<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19698.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「ダ:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>I found Dahlia's name! And her groom, Reg,
next to it too.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19699.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「ふ:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>It shows they were husband and wife.
In other words, this census, undoubtedly,
must've been made just before the wedding.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19701.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「ほ:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>This looks recent. One person's name
appears to have been erased.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19702.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「名:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Everything but the name is still here.
Let me see... Gender... Female and her age...
Is 10 years old.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19703.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「１: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>A 10 year old girl...<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19705.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「あ:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Ahh, sorry for spacing out. Th...Thanks to
you, I think an important clue was found.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19706.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「で:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>But we'll continue this another time.
That's all for today!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19707.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「私:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Thank you for being my assistant.
Can I give you this as thanks?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19708.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Well...Well, come back in a while.
I'll be waiting for you, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
